PerformanceElementTimingRenderTime.summary: The renderTime read-only property of the interface returns the render time of the associated element.
PerformanceElementTimingRenderTime.value: A with the render time of the element.For images this will be the image rendering timestamp. This is defined as the next paint that occurs after the image becomes fully loaded. If the timing allow check fails (as defined by the Timing-allow-origin header) this will return 0.For text nodes this will be the text rendering timestamp. This is defined as when the element becomes text painted.
